brand.title: UX Aspects
brand.slogan: Enterprise Big Data UX Framework for AngularJS

overview.title: About UX Aspects
overview.description: UX Aspects (AngularJS) contains the legacy AngularJS components from UX Aspects, along with support for using the legacy components in a hybrid Angular application.

features.title: AngularJS
features.description: Components are compatible with AngularJS and hybrid Angular applications.

features.title: Analytics
features.description: UX Aspects has a wide range of powerful charts giving you many ways to present data.

features.title: Customizable
features.description: Components are configurable and can be customized to suit your needs.

features.title: Responsive
features.description: Components are designed to be responsive, working great on mobile, desktop, and tablets.

social.title: Get Involved
social.description: Get involved in the UX Aspects project. Suggest new features, report issues or take part in development.

links.title: GitHub
links.description: Contribute and report issues via GitHub.
